name: Vocabulary Extraordinaire - DEMO
description:
Disclaimer; this game is in a really early phase so changes will be made

V1

Two or three letters will pop up on the screen, you have to write a word with those letters (connected) in a span of five seconds.

Keep in mind that you can't reuse words.

Don't let the simplicity fool you, it can get complicated at times

OST: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/800506942/

P: Shorty/Theshortman & Flamace 2023
